title: @Riot Do you feel you have reached the level of diversity you want in s5 as it is your main theme?
body:
Just want to know. I feel you have made it quite a bit as in the LCS and in general there are many different picks and not the same old same old comps. People are actually taking strategic picks. 

My main questions::

Do you feel you have reached the level of champion Diversity you have wanted to see for season 5?
What are you still proposing to change for the future of champion diversity?
Is there anything you want to see more out of champion diversity, in other words, what are your expectations?

replies.body: There's so much diversity that everyone is bitching about fixing Taric more than bitching about nerfing Lee Sin. That's how diverse we've gotten that we need Taric fixed and ignoring Lee because everyone is rolling different champs other than Lee. Scary stuff.
